items.label: Finish
items.description: Define one or more finishes for your part. For each finish, please review Xometry's acceptable quality standards.
Specify the total number of threads on this part.

items.label: Inserts
items.helpDescription: E.g. PEM ® fasteners (or equivalent), rivets, press-fit, helical, dowel pins

items.description: Specify the total number of standard inserts on this part.

items.label: Tolerance
items.helpDescription: Tolerances should be converted to an equivalent uniform range for an accurate quote. (E.g. bilateral, unilateral, true position, profile, flatness, other geometric tolerances).

items.label: Tightest Tolerance
items.description: Tolerances will be held to +/-.005"(+/-.127mm) in accordance with ISO 2768 unless otherwise specified.

items.label: Tightest Tolerance
items.description: Tolerances will be held to +/-.010"(+/-.254mm) in accordance with ISO 2768 unless otherwise specified.

items.label: Surface Roughness
items.description: Surface roughness will be held to 125uin/3.2um Ra unless otherwise specified.

items.label: Drawing required.
items.description: A drawing is required showing surface roughness locations. Use the Upload Drawings button at the top of this page to add a drawing.

items.label: Part Marking
items.description: Select all that apply.

items.label: Silkscreen
items.helpDescription: Silkscreen is a part marking technique that uses a mesh to transfer ink onto a substrate and a stencil to block ink, as needed, to print the desired text or image onto the substrate. Upload a 2D drawing showing part marking text, color, and location.

items.label: Ink Stamp
items.helpDescription: Ink Stamping applies ink characters by any means that does not damage the surface of the part. If the part is coated, a clear lacquer or topcoat may be applied to the part marking. Upload a 2D drawing showing part marking text, color, and location.

items.label: Bag and Tag
items.helpDescription: Bagging and Tagging will apply a tag to the part(s) bag with the required identification information. The tag will be located on the bag as to not damage the bag or the part. Upload a 2D drawing showing the required tag text.

items.label: Engraving
items.helpDescription: Laser marking uses a low-powered beam, which moves slowly over the substrate surface, to mark the surface in a method known as discoloration. Typically, laser marking discoloration is black. Upload a 2D drawing showing part marking text and location.

items.label: Laser Mark
items.helpDescription: Laser marking uses a low-powered beam, which moves slowly over the substrate surface, to mark the surface in a method known as discoloration. Typically, laser marking discoloration is black. Please upload a 2D drawing in the Notes & Drawings tab showing part marking text and location.

items.label: Drawing required.
items.description: A drawing is required showing part marking text, color, and location. Use the Upload Drawings button at the top of this page to add a drawing.

items.label: Inspection
items.description: Inspection documentation will not ship with your parts unless you choose an option with a dimensional report.
Learn more about inspection options, non-conformance handling, and see examples

items.label: Standard Inspection
items.description: The inspection will be in-process. Documentation will not be shipped with parts. Final verification to be performed on critical dimensions and features at discretion of Xometry. Typically limited to less than 20 dimensions.

items.label: Formal Inspection with Dimensional Report
items.description: An inspection report is delivered with the part(s). Limited to 100 critical dimensions otherwise a manual quote is required. Drawing required.

items.label: Drawing required.
items.description: A drawing is required for this inspection. Use the Upload Drawings button at the top of this page to add a drawing.

items.label: CMM Inspection with Dimensional Report
items.description: A dimensional inspection report generated from a CMM inspection will be shipped with your parts. Limited to 100 critical dimensions otherwise a manual quote is required.

items.label: Drawing required.
items.description: A drawing is required for this inspection. Use the Upload Drawings button at the top of this page to add a drawing.

items.label: First Article Inspection Report (FAIR AS9102)
items.description: The inspection will be performed randomly. Documentation will be shipped with the part(s). Limited to 100 critical dimensions otherwise a manual quote is required.

items.label: Drawing required.
items.description: A drawing is required for this inspection. Use the Upload Drawings button at the top of this page to add a drawing.

items.label: Source Inspection
items.description: The inspection will be in-process. An inspection report is delivered with the part(s).

items.label: Drawing required.
items.description: A drawing is required for this inspection. Use the Upload Drawings button at the top of this page to add a drawing.

items.label: Custom Inspection
items.description: First Article Inspections, Non-Destructive Testing, Serialization, Source Inspection, Custom Sampling Plan etc... datasheet optional.

items.label: Drawing required.
items.description: A drawing is required for this inspection. Use the Upload Drawings button at the top of this page to add a drawing.

items.label: Certificates and Supplier Qualifications
items.description: Please select all required certificates below. Certificates will be applied to all parts in this order unless otherwise stated.

items.label: ITAR/EAR Registration
items.helpDescription: (+1 business day) I certify that my parts ARE for military application, defense-related, subject to the United States Munitions List, subject to the International Traffic in Arms Regulations (ITAR) or otherwise subject to United States export restriction, and that I am a United States citizen or lawful permanent resident of the United States.

items.label: Hardware Certification
items.helpDescription: (+ $15 per line item)  Provides certification of hardware installed in parts. Applies to all parts with inserts selected.

items.label: Certificate of Conformance
items.helpDescription: (+ $10 per line item) Certifies that supplied part meets the required specifications.

items.label: Material Traceability
items.helpDescription: (+ $15 per line item) Provides traceability for material used in the fabrication of your parts. Applies to all parts in the quote.

items.label: Material Certification
items.description: What is a material certification ?

items.label: Standard Material Certification
items.helpDescription: (+$15 per line item and + 1 business days) Certifies that the part's material chemical and physical properties are in compliance with the specified standard(s).

items.label: Domestic Compliant Material Cert
items.helpDescription: (+$15 per line item and +2 business days) Certifies that the part material is American Made (melted and manufactured in the U.S.A)

items.label: DFARS Compliant Material Cert
items.helpDescription: (+$15 per line item and + 2 business days) Certifies that the part is compliant with the Defense Federal Acquisition Regulation (DFARS).

items.label: Notes
items.description: *Additional specifications described in Notes may not be included in Xometry's automatic price. Requests not conforming to Xometry's Manufacturing Standards may be invalid, or affect pricing and lead times.

presets.label: AWS Weld Specs
presets.value: American Welding Society weld certifications required. Specific requirements detailed on part notes and on the drawings.

presets.label: AS9100
presets.value: Manufacturing facility must have current AS9100 registration.

presets.label: Broaching Tooling
presets.value: Broaching Tooling included

presets.label: Clean Room Manufacturing
presets.value: Requires manufacturing in a clean room environment. See drawing or part notes for specific requirements. Clean room certification required.

presets.label: Customer Supplied Material
presets.value: Material to be supplied by customer

presets.label: Custom Die Casting / Forming
presets.value: Custom Die Casting / Forming included

presets.label: First Piece Shipment
presets.value: Requires a first piece shipment prior to manufacturing remaining parts. Production of balance of order not to begin before customer approval.

presets.label: Grinding
presets.value: Grinding included

presets.label: Gun Drilling
presets.value: Gun Drilling included

presets.label: Hole Pop EDM
presets.value: Hole Pop EDM  included

presets.label: Lapping
presets.value: Lapping included

presets.label: ISO9001
presets.value: Manufacturing facility must have current ISO9001 registration.

presets.label: ISO13485
presets.value: Manufacturing facility must have current ISO13485 registration.

presets.label: ISO/TS 16949
presets.value: Manufacturing facility must have current ISO/TS 16949 registration.

presets.label: Mating Components
presets.value: Order contains parts with mating features. Fit checks required prior to shipment.

presets.label: NADCAP
presets.value: Vendor must have NADCAP certifications for required secondary process(es). NADCAP unique identifier must be located on the certification.

presets.label: Non-Destructive Testing
presets.value: See drawing or part notes for specific requirements. Process certifications required.

presets.label: Physical Testing / Validation
presets.value: See drawing or part notes for specific requirements. Testing certifications required.

presets.label: PPAP
presets.value: See part notes for Production Part Approval Process details.

presets.label: Precision Cleaning
presets.value: See drawing or part notes for specific requirements. Process certifications required.

presets.label: Prop 65
presets.value: All processing, raw material and secondary processing must comply with Prop 65 requirements.

presets.label: Ram / Sinker EDM
presets.value: Ram / Sinker EDM included

presets.label: ROHS / REACH
presets.value: All processing, raw material and secondary processing must comply with ROHS and REACH requirements.

presets.label: Sheet Metal Forming + CNC
presets.value: Sheet Metal Forming + CNC included

presets.label: Spline Cutting / Gear Cutting
presets.value: Spline Cutting / Gear Cutting included

tagDefinitions.description: The tag that is associated with the element with the surface roughness possibiltiies for metal materials.
The tag that is associated with the element with the finish possibiltiies for aluminum materials.
The tag that is associated with the element with the tolerance possibiltiies for metal materials.
The tag that is associated with the element with the tolerance possibiltiies for plastic materials.
The tag that is associated with the element with the finish possibiltiies for copper materials.
The tag that is associated with the element with the finish possibiltiies for composite materials.
The tag that is associated with the element with the finish possibiltiies for plastic materials.
The tag that is associated with the element with the finish possibiltiies for stainless steel materials.
The tag that is associated with the element with the finish possibiltiies for steel materials.
The tag that is associated with the element with the finish possibiltiies for titanium materials.
The tag that is associated with the element with the finish possibiltiies for other materials.
